entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -38.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
